sense.gloss: dharma mandala (in Shingon), mandala were each deity is represented by its seed syllable in Sanskrit
x: 四種曼荼羅・ししゅまんだら

sense.gloss: karma mandala (in Shingon), three-dimensional mandala with a sculpture of each deity
